items.sentence: Whenever I feel like giving up, I think of what my father used to tell me.
I know you want to act all macho and all, but now's not the time for that.
I've spent a lot of time with Tom, and I've gotten to know him quite well.
Since his arrival in town, all the women have remained cautious about him.
Tom bought a mask and a snorkel so he could go snorkeling with his friends.
